column4: no I don't have anything in restricted manager but "atheros hardware access layer (HAL)"
I also tried envy It said my card wasn't supported and I said "install anyway" and it messed up my comp
you may not want to use envy to install the drivers.. it might break the upgrade coming out next month.. Wait until Hardy is out. It may have better support for ati...
ya I already tried envy and it did mess stuff up, I'm not trying it again
